title: Which is that font...
content:
Is that of the Smart graphic advert? Please I need to know!  
Thank you!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210023236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/anuncio4_6732.jpg)
author: Saratyp

comments.content:
Hi Sara,

this is Smart [Courier](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210023236/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Courier), a corporate font by [Dalton Maag](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210023236/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dalton%20Maag). See [this older thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210023236/http:/typophile.com/node/5418) and [this great list](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210023236/http:/www.typografie.info/typowiki/index.php?title=Hausschrift-Liste_Unternehmen-zu-Schrift).  
F

one similar but more detailled that I like is adore by garage font.  
But it is more extended that the one you are looking for.

[http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=420946](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210023236/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=420946 "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=420946")
